notices.name: New deploys are failing during build stage

updates.message: This incident has been resolved. Deploys made during the previous outage (https://railway.instatus.com/clkrvj6lu1289295hroxv62pqbq9) requires a re-build. If builds are not working for you, **please trigger a new build by pushing code/an empty commit (`git commit --allow-empty -m 'Rebuild'`), or doing `railway up` if you deploy from CLI.**
updates.messageHtml: This incident has been resolved. Deploys made during the previous outage (https://railway.instatus.com/clkrvj6lu1289295hroxv62pqbq9) requires a re-build. If builds are not working for you, please trigger a new build by pushing code/an empty commit (git commit --allow-empty -m 'Rebuild'), or doing railway up if you deploy from CLI.

notices.name: Deployments Not Transitioning Beyond Build State

updates.message: We encountered an issue with config propagation to our builders causing deploys to not turn live. After deploying an update internally to make this configuration availible- queued deploys are now going through. No action is required on your part.
updates.messageHtml: We encountered an issue with config propagation to our builders causing deploys to not turn live. After deploying an update internally to make this configuration availible- queued deploys are now going through. No action is required on your part.

updates.message: An issue related to a builder configuration is the culprit here. As a result, builds aren't able to progress because it's looking for configuration that isn't fully rolled out. We are kicking the tyres and deploying a fix. Apologies!
updates.messageHtml: An issue related to a builder configuration is the culprit here. As a result, builds aren't able to progress because it's looking for configuration that isn't fully rolled out. We are kicking the tyres and deploying a fix. Apologies!

updates.message: Deployments Not Progressing Through State Properly

notices.name: Deploys are taking longer than usual to go out

updates.message:
We've fixed the issues that caused the recent deployment outages.

On Friday we changed the way we interpolate environment variables and added a custom parser to allow for more complex behaviour. A bug in this parser caused it to occasionally lock up the workers that handle deployments - and this meant that we exhausted our deployment execution slots and slowed down builds. We have temporarily disabled several features (cron jobs and variable functions) while we were isolating the issue. We expect to re-enable these features early in the week. We are sorry for any inconvenience that these incidents caused.
updates.messageHtml:
We've fixed the issues that caused the recent deployment outages.

On Friday we changed the way we interpolate environment variables and added a custom parser to allow for more complex behaviour. A bug in this parser caused it to occasionally lock up the workers that handle deployments - and this meant that we exhausted our deployment execution slots and slowed down builds. We have temporarily disabled several features (cron jobs and variable functions) while we were isolating the issue. We expect to re-enable these features early in the week. We are sorry for any inconvenience that these incidents caused.

updates.message: Deployments are back to normal and we're continuing to monitor
updates.messageHtml: Deployments are back to normal and we're continuing to monitor
